product_name: Amphipod Hydraform Jett-Lite Handheld Water Bottle - 12 fl. oz.
long_description: The Hydraform Jett-Lite Handheld Water Bottle holds 12 fl. oz. of water and is shaped to keep your hand in a relaxed, natural position so you can stay hydrated and comfortable on long runs.
short_description: The Hydraform Jett-Lite Handheld Water Bottle holds 12 fl. oz. of water and is shaped to keep your hand in a relaxed, natural position so you can stay hydrated and comfortable on long runs.
